summary: This is an email chain from August 13, 2019, forwarding documents related to an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein while in detention. The email confirms receipt of various reports, photographs, and memoranda concerning the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the incident reports and documents being forwarded in the email chain.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Appears in document titles (photographs, request to staff) as another individual involved in or related to the incident.

connections.description: Both are named in documents (photographs, reports) related to the same incident in detention, suggesting they were involved in or subjects of the same event.

events.title: Email Forwarding Incident Documents
events.description: An email is sent from OIG to USANYS and FBI contacts, forwarding a package of documents related to an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein in detention.

events.title: Epstein Detention Incident
events.description: Referenced incident involving Jeffrey Epstein while in custody, prompting the creation of reports, photographs, a medical assessment, and staff memoranda.

keyFacts: On August 13, 2019, the OIG forwarded a package of incident-related documents concerning Jeffrey Epstein to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) and the FBI.
The document package includes an incident report, detention order, medical assessment, staff memoranda, photographs of Epstein and another inmate named Tartaglione, and a photo of a 'homemade rope'.
The correspondence indicates an official investigation into an incident involving Epstein while he was in detention.
